keys: sensores de la entrada de información

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78602</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Input sensors: tilt switch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Input-Sensoren: Neigungschalter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Capteurs d'entrée : commutateur 
d'inclinaison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sensores da entrada: interruptor da 
inclinação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sensori dell'input: interruttore di 
inclinazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αισθητήρες εισόδου: διακόπτης κλίσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sensores de la entrada de información: 
interruptor de la inclinación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations showing examples of input sensors. The tilt switch stays on by tilting the glass capsule such that mercury, a liquid metal conductor, connects with the terminal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Control systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glass capsule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">input sensors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">terminals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tilt switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, die Beispiele der 
Input-Sensoren zeigen. Der Neigungschalter bleibt an, indem er 
die Glaskapsel so kippt, daß Quecksilber, ein flüssiger 
Metallleiter, an das Terminal anschließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers de trois illustrations montrant des exemples
des capteurs d'entrée. Le commutateur d'inclinaison reste en 
fonction à côté d'incliner la capsule de verre tels que le mercure,
un conducteur liquide en métal, se relie au terminal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de três ilustrações que mostram exemplos 
de sensores da entrada. O interruptor da inclinação permanece 
sobre inclinando a cápsula de vidro tais que o mercúrio, um condutor
líquido do metal, conecta com o terminal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano gli 
esempi dei sensori dell'input. L'interruttore di inclinazione 
rimane sopra inclinando la capsula di vetro tali che il mercurio, un 
conduttore liquido del metallo, collega con il terminale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν παραδείγματα 
των αισθητήρων εισόδου. Ο διακόπτης κλίσης μένει επάνω με 
την κλίση της κάψας γυαλιού έτσι ώστε ο υδράργυρος, ένας υγρός
αγωγός μετάλλων, συνδέει με το τερματικό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de tres ilustraciones que muestran 
ejemplos de los sensores de la entrada de información. El 
interruptor de la inclinación permanece encendido inclinando la 
cápsula de cristal tales que el mercurio, un conductor líquido del 
metal, conecta con la terminal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steuersysteme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glaskapsel</string>
